message: Hi. Welcome to SofaNest, my name is Chris. How can I help you?
Hi, I spoke to someone last week about missing items from my delivery, and nothing has been resolved. I’m still waiting for the cushions and sofa legs!

I’m really sorry to hear that your issue hasn’t been resolved yet, and I completely understand how frustrating this must be. Let me check your previous case and get this sorted for you today.  Before we proceed, let’s run through security. Could you please confirm your reference number?
Thank you for that. Could you also confirm your email address and name so I can locate your case?
My email is alex.smith@example.com, and my name is Alex Smith.
Thank you, Alex. That’s all correct. Let me recap: your reference number is 98765-4321, your email is alex.smith@example.com, and your name is Alex Smith. Is that right?
Thank you. Let’s talk about what works for you. I see from your case notes that the cushions and sofa legs were missing from your delivery. Have there been any updates since your last contact?
No, I haven’t heard anything since I reported it. I expected this to be resolved by now.

I’m really sorry about the lack of follow-up, Alex. I completely understand your frustration, and I’ll make sure this is prioritized. Let me contact our warehouse team and confirm the status of your replacement items. One moment, please.
Thank you for waiting. I’ve confirmed that your cushions and sofa legs are in stock and ready to be shipped. Can you give me your availability for redelivery this week?
Perfect! I’ve scheduled the redelivery for Thursday morning, and you’ll receive a confirmation email shortly. What would you consider a satisfactory resolution for this situation?
Honestly, I just want the items delivered. This has been such a hassle.
I completely understand, Alex. I truly appreciate your patience, and I’ll personally follow up to ensure the delivery goes smoothly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s all. Thanks for your help.
You’re very welcome, Alex. I’m truly sorry for the delay, but I’m glad we’ve got this sorted. Have a great day, and thank you for choosing SofaNest!
